title: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed on a personal taste basis, which should be changed. It is unclear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. However, all actions should be reachable from the editor, without forcing users to switch the view.
OB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" is not available when selecting text.
EB: I expected the action "Add Javadoc Comment" to be available in the Edit menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the editor
2. Select some text
3. Check the available actions in the Edit menu
